item.title: 130.Surrounded Regions
item.description: DFS # class Solution { public: void dfs(vector<vector<char>>& board, int i, int j, char c) { if(i < 0 || i >= board.size() || j < 0 || j >= board[0].size() || board[i][j] != 'O') return; board[i][j] = c; dfs(board, i-1, j, c); dfs(board, i+1, j, c); dfs(board, i, j-1, c); dfs(board, i, j+1, c); } void solve(vector<vector<char>>& board) { int m = board.size(); int n = board[0].size(); for(int i = 0; i < m; i++) { if(board[i][0] == 'O') dfs(board, i , 0, 'A'); if(board[i][n-1] == 'O') dfs(board, i, n-1, 'A'); } for(int j = 0; j < n; j++) { if(board[0][j] == 'O') dfs(board, 0, j, 'A'); if(board[m-1][j] == 'O') dfs(board, m-1, j, 'A'); } for(int i = 0; i < m; i++) { for(int j = 0; j < n; j++) { if(board[i][j] == 'O') { board[i][j] = 'X'; } if(board[i][j] == 'A') { board[i][j] = 'O'; } } } } };
